item.title: How does rules engine help the blockchain adoption
item.description: When you want to integrate blockchain into your business but you dont have so much development resources, do you just give up? Don’t worry! Rules engine comes to rescue! What is a rule engine? Is a component embedded in the application that separates business decisions from the code applied. The core of the rules engine is to obtain knowledge (knowledge) Apply knowledge to specific data (fact) Use “production rules” IF THEN Rule expression logic (any logic can be expressed this way)
